about:
I am a skilled full-stack developer with experience in front-end and back-end technologies. I specialize in developing end-to-end applications that provide an optimal user experience.
 Having over 11 years of experience in Python, React, Angular, NodeJs, AWS Services, NumPy, Panda, MatPlotlib, Socket.io,Elasticsearch, Django, flask, fast-api, express, typescript, javascript,Bootstrap, css  etc.
